column1: ONCE AGAIN. just Bc you see an Asian person doesn’t mean they have the Coronavirus y’all are treating these people the same way y’all treated blacks when the Ebola outbreak was around. REGARDLESS of their connection to wuhan y’all treat everyone like a carrier. Y’all are shitty
